Package application

Class Computer

java.lang.Object
application.Computer
public class Computer
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the Computer player which is using minimax to find the best move
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Nagy

  • Method Details

    • returnBestMove

      public int[] returnBestMove​(Tile[][] board, int depth, boolean maximizingPlayer)
      This method finds all the possible moves for the ai and calls the minimax method on them to find the best possible move
      Parameters:
      board - The board to find the best move on
      depth - The depth of the search for the minimax algorithm
      maximizingPlayer - This stores who if the maximizing player is the one that called the method
      Returns:
      The best move for the ai

    • copyBoard

      public Tile[][] copyBoard​(Tile[][] board)
      This method makes a copy of a board
      Parameters:
      board - The board to be copied
      Returns:
      The copy of the board

    • minimax

      public double minimax​(Tile[][] board, int depth, boolean isMaximizingPlayer, double alpha, double beta)
      This is the minimax for the ai
      Parameters:
      board - This is the node
      depth - This is the depth of the search
      isMaximizingPlayer - Who calls the function
      alpha - The alpha value for alpha-beta pruning
      beta - The beta value for alpha-beta pruning
      Returns:
      The score of the node

    • evaluate

      public int evaluate​(Tile[][] board)
      This is the heuristic function for the minimax algorithm
      Parameters:
      board - The board to be evaluated
      Returns:
      The score of the board
